alert.note: Alert for Hickman (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 18 at 10:41PM CST until February 21 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... Duck River At Centerville affecting Hickman County. For the Duck River...including Centerville...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Duck River At Centerville. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Water begins to overflow the banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM CST Saturday the stage was 18.6 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.5 feet tomorrow morning. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday evening at 600 PM CST.
